entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Baie-Saint-Paul
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:48 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
